model.name: occams-razor-is-cmm4-applied
model.title: Occam's Razor is CMM4 Applied
model.description: CMM4 means questioning CMM3 definitions by finding simpler and shorter ones. Apply Occam's Razor: challenge existing complexity with elegant simplicity. When implementing, ask clarifying questions to find the simplest solution rather than assuming complexity. This is CMM4 - continuously improving by simplification.
